//
// Generated by Microsoft (R) HLSL Shader Compiler 9.29.952.3111
//
// Parameters:
//
//   float4 mvp[2];
//   float4 texgen[4];
//
//
// Registers:
//
//   Name         Reg   Size
//   ------------ ----- ----
//   mvp          c6       2
//   texgen       c8       2
//

    vs_3_0
def c220, 0, 0, 0.0625, 0
    def c0, 0, 1, 0, 0
    dcl_color v0
    dcl_position v1
    dcl_color o0
    dcl_texcoord o1.xy
    dcl_position o2
dcl_2d s0
dp4 r2.x, v1, c6

// Adjust X Coord from Const1 in dx9settings.ini:
texldl r1, c220.z, s0
mul r1.x, r1.x, c200.x
add r2.x, r2.x, r1.x
mov o2.x, r2.x

    dp4 o2.y, v1, c7
    dp4 o1.x, v1, c8
    dp4 o1.y, v1, c9
    mov o0, v0
    mov o2.zw, c0.xyxy
